title: Driving a heavy vehicle in the London low emission zone (LEZ)

details.description: Find out if you'll be charged for driving your heavy vehicle in Greater London, which is a Low Emission Zone (LEZ)
details.more_information:
You don’t have to register on the website to check your vehicle or to pay the charge.

You can check your vehicle by type or registration number.

Exempt vehicles

Cars and motorcycles are exempt from the scheme. So are some light vans, specialist and historic vehicles. See the TfL website for a list of exemptions.

Vehicles to check

You’ll need to check your lorry, coach, bus, minibus, service vehicle or specialist vehicle (eg motorhome or motorised horsebox).

What to pay

Unless your vehicle is exempt, you’ll need to pay a daily charge to bring it into Greater London. The TfL website lists the current charges.
